comments:
Description:
  If a add a group on a column which include null or empty value. The group Toc will cause exception.But the excption is not displayed when preview in web viewer. May be the behavior should be consistent.

Step to reproduce:
1. use the attach report as example
2. preview it by differnt ways

Actual result:
Exception occure when preview but the exception isn't displayed when preview in web viewer

Error log:

ListGroup NewListGroup1: 
- TOC can not be null or empty. 
TOC can not be null or empty. ( 1 time(s) )

Excepted result:
  The behavior had better be consistent.

Created an attachment (id=53040)
the design flie

Empty TOC has been fixed in bug162827.

For the exception, the web-viewer from document won't has exception as the exception is throws out in the report generation instead of the rendering. And PDF do not output any error information since PDF is the final file to be print. So the exception problem is not a bug.

traces.message: TOC can not be null or empty.
